Really Cool Portfolio

Ok, if you say so!

What you're looking at is not your typical portfolio. This portfolio automatically styles itself.

DO IT!

What's happening is that there are ten random test album cover images above. Everytime your hit "Do It!", a new random image is pulled from a folder, and the app reprocesses the image and automatically changes the page background color, h1, h2, and p colors. This methodology brings design consistency to any webpage.

The significance here is that very few websites in the world have been able to achieve this without human intervention! Future applications include:

  • Converted web pages for different devices
  • AdWords landing pages, automatically styled
  • User Profile pages, automatically matching the style of the profile pic
  • Any kind of blog of landing page

I came up with this approach after having styled over 200 mobile websites. I realized to make any website attractive, your background color, h1, and h2 colors must be derived from the most popular colors in the logo or header image. Eventually I started experimenting with the programatic approach to discovering the key colors of an image, led me and then automatically applying them to key page elements.
